## andCommaConditions() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

ANDs given conditions that determine if a comma is necessary.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function andCommaConditions(...conditions: string[]): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

conditions


</td><td>

string\[\]


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

"false" if `conditions` includes any "false". "true" if `conditions` is empty.

## Remarks

Encloses individual items in `conditions` in parenthesis "()" and concatenates them with " &amp;&amp; " unless `conditions` has only one item.

Drops any "true" in `conditions`<!-- -->.
